Reviews.Title: In love
Reviews.Author: rg3269
Reviews.Content: I'm a novice photographer and I really love this camera!  I bought the dummies book to teach me how to use it and I can see it becoming a wonderful hobby!  I can only give a beginner's review, but camera takes wonderful pictures. I saw the D5300 after ordering this, but for where I'm at this camera is more than perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great price on this 2 lens kit
Reviews.Author: Joe b
Reviews.Content: super fast shipping with amazon prime and a great price on this 2 lens kit. Only down side is i have to find a new camera pack back to fit the 300mm lens and everything else.

Reviews.Title: real d5200 and I love it
Reviews.Author: Rayhn
Reviews.Content: I know many folks look to make sure the camera is a legit Nikon camera and the one I got is and registered. It takes great photos so far and I cannot wait to use it for taking shots of wildlife and my daughter.
